dmca.title: TV Streaming DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
The purpose of this e-mail is to  
communicate our claim of identification of one of your costumers
registered  
as TEVEPERUANA.INFO as a domain name in order to notify him/her of our  
legal actions.

The user of TEVEPERUANA.INFO is using in peruvian territory our  
programs/productions of TV signal by streamming, both without a written  
consent of the Licensor (Media Network Latin America SAC)
This web site infringes a copyright of our company. They announce programs
 
of our property by their web site without autorization.
Thank you for your help.

Domains: TEVEPERUANA.INFO and NOTIPERU.NET
